args.content: VLB-TIX für Vertreterinnen und Vertreter – Aktuelles für Reise und Börsen

badge.description: Object with keys `text` and `iconName` where `iconName` is optional.

img.description: Object with keys `src`, `alt`, and `caption` where `src` is required. The `alt` and `caption` attributes are optional.

attributes.description: Additional arbitrary HTML attributes to be added to the root element of the component. (Can also include `class` attribute.)
